meanings.definition: An increase or revival after a period of little activity or popularity.
meanings.sent1: The town experienced a resurgence in tourism after renovating the historic landmarks.
meanings.sent2: The resurgence of vinyl records has surprised many music enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The sudden resurgence of interest in knitting caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a resurgence of sunshine after a stormy day.
meanings.sent5: The resurgence of the old tradition brought joy to the entire community.

meanings.definition: The act of rising or coming back into use or prominence.
meanings.sent1: After years of decline, the company's resurgence in the market was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The resurgence of handwritten letters is a nostalgic trend among young people.
meanings.sent3: The resurgence of bell-bottom pants made him chuckle at the retro fashion comeback.
meanings.sent4: The artist's new painting marked a resurgence of creativity in her work.
meanings.sent5: The resurgence of interest in ancient history sparked a wave of new research.
